data.title: Publication - Review: Interoperability standards - Digital objects in their own right
data.text: commissioned by the Wellcome Trust focusing on interoperability standards for digital research outputs.

data.title: Outreach
data.text: BioSharing is presented as an invited talk at the ELIXIR-Italy, CHARME, and NETTAB joint meeting (Rome, Italy).

data.title: Outreach
data.text: BioSharing is presented in various sessions at International Data week, which combined SciDataCon and the RDA 8th Plenary. More information and links to the slides is available on our RDA WG page.

data.title: Outreach
data.text: BioSharing is presented as an invited talk in the ELIXIR track at ECCB 2016 (The Hague, The Netherlands).

data.title: BioSharing Educational launched
data.text: To aid and increase user knowledge of data standards in the life sciences and how the BioSharing portal can be used to map the landscape of data standards, the databases that create or implement them, and the data policies that endorse them, we have created >40 Frequently Asked Questions. This is the first step in our new educational section.

data.title: BioSharing is the ELIXIR Registry of Standards
data.text: BioSharing becomes the ELIXIR Registry of Standards and operates as part of the ELIXIR Interoperability Platform
